comment.author: 42717265@N00
comment._content: The uniformity of the diameter of these logs makes me wonder if this is one of the log cabins built from Cabbage Palms (Sabal Palmetto)? Several are still being used at Myakka State Park www.flickr.com/photos/jprentice/151427423/ and other examples exist in the Yankeetown area (vertical logs). If you have more info on cabbage palm log cabins, feel free to contact me at cabbagepalm@gmail.com or look for my photostream on flickr: cabbagepalmguy

comment.author: 42717265@N00
comment._content: Note also that the corners are not the common notched "Lincoln Log" corners that involve cutting and overlap and protrude.
